explanation: The agreement does not include an explicit clause stating that the confidentiality obligations survive termination or expiration for a defined period (e.g., five years). Section 4 only says the information will remain subject to the NDA for as long as it is retained, and Section 9 merely addresses liability for prior breaches. Neither provision sets a fixed survival period, which the rule requires.
rule: State that confidentiality obligations survive termination or expiration of the NDA for the specified period.
exampleLanguage: The confidentiality obligations set forth in this Agreement shall survive the termination or expiration of this Agreement for a period of five (5) years.
